issue.title: [C++] Create an asynchronous nursery to simplify capture logic
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13680](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13680). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The asynchronous nursery manages a set of asynchronous tasks and objects.  The nursery will not exit until all of those tasks have finished.  This allows one to safely capture fields for asynchronous callbacks.
